articles.title: Jobless Americans missed $17.6 billion in benefits last month because of relief bill delays - CNN
articles.description: Jobless Americans missed out on billions of dollars of benefits last month because then-President Donald Trump and Congress did not finalize a coronavirus relief bill until the end of December.
articles.content: (CNN)Jobless Americans missed out on billions of dollars of benefits last month because then-President Donald Trump and Congress did not finalize a coronavirus relief bill until the end of December.… [+4897 chars]
